com.twitter.sdk.android.tweetui

Class TweetTimelineRecyclerViewAdapter

  • Object
    • <any>
      • com.twitter.sdk.android.tweetui.TweetTimelineRecyclerViewAdapter

  • public class TweetTimelineRecyclerViewAdapter
extends <any>
    TweetTimelineRecyclerViewAdapter is a RecyclerView adapter which can provide Timeline Tweets to RecyclerViews.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TweetTimelineRecyclerViewAdapter

        public TweetTimelineRecyclerViewAdapter(Context context,
                                        Timeline<Tweet> timeline)
        Constructs a TweetTimelineRecyclerViewAdapter for a RecyclerView implementation of a timeline
        Parameters:
        context - the context for row views.
        timeline - a Timeline<Tweet> providing access to Tweet data items.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if context is null
